name: End of a (Shady) Bussiness
description:
Your Spaceship is being attacked! Well.. it has a good reason.. You, and the crew of the ship are smuggling shady stuff in space between planets. You suddenly wake up to your captain shouting that you are under attack. What will happen? Who knows...

Controlls

In the game you can open doors with keys, and interact with NPCs

MovementW, A, S, D and / or  arrow keys. InteractJ, K and / or Z, X Friday Night Game Jam

This game was made for a game jam, where you have to make a game in 3 hours. The 3-hours contain the actual development, but not the planning. 

In this jam we had to use a specific assetpack, I had to make some changes to the assetpack, to make it work with Game Boy Studio.

Ninja Adventure Asset Pack

Game Boy Studio
